title: New modern house for sale in Panadura
details:
Architect designed New Single Story House, Located at Pallimulla, Panadura, in a decent environment is for sale. Electricity, well water supply – 24.5 Perches Land
4 bedrooms (master bedroom with en-suite
3 bathrooms
Servant bathroom
Living/ Dining area with modern pantry
Good size front yard
3km to Panadura Town
Very good neighbourhood
